about_the_game:
MasterChef: Learn To Cook - Prove You're a Master Chef in the Kitchen!


Calling all aspiring chefs, MasterChef: Learn to Cook! throws you into a culinary throw down unlike any other. Sharpen your knives, prep your stations, and get ready to battle it out online with fellow foodies in this fast-paced cooking competition.

Get matched with other players around the globe. Choose your ingredients, slice, prepare, plate and serve delicious dishes with style in fun mini-games! The MasterChef judges will evaluate your dish based on your performance and speed. Complete and unlock new recipes, challenges, and mini-games along your cooking journey!

Do you think you can handle the heat?

Master Recipe Mastery 

Over 120 delicious dishes to learn and conquer, from classic pizzas to exotic sushi!


                        Become a Kitchen Superstar

Craft your unique chef avatar and show off your style with tons of customization options!

                  FEATURES:

Mini Game Mania: Sharpen your skills with a variety of wacky cooking challenges that will test your reflexes and timing. 

Upgrade Your Gear: Earn new and improved cookware as you progress. Sharper knives, faster ovens - the kitchen is your playground!

Join the Social Club: Share your culinary creations, brag about your wins, and connect with fellow chefs online!

MasterChef: Learn to Cook! is the perfect blend of competitive chaos and culinary creativity. Can you withstand the pressure and become the ultimate champion? There's only one way to find out!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion or later.
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz or higher (single core or higher).
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or higher with 512 MB VRAM (NVIDIA or ATI).
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

name: MasterChef: Learn to Cook!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: Not Supported

short_description: MasterChef: Culinary Showdown- Master the Kitchen, Challenge the World!Sharpen your knives and compete with global chefs in wacky mini-games! Master over 120 recipes, unlock culinary challenges, upgrade your kitchen, and become the ultimate MasterChef! ‍
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
